name: Poker 3 Bags
description: 3 Bags offers you three games with bots, including Poker Texas Hold'em, Throwaway Fool, and the new, author’s game Three Bags. A special feature of the poker game is the ability to view all poker combinations and their names. You can see both the combinations you have collected and all the potential ones by clicking the question mark button. This is a great way to get to know poker! Artificial intelligence of ten competitors will be improved in new versions.
